mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ar.acquire_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, SUM(ar.amount) as totalAmount FROM asset_record ar WHERE ar.create_user = #{userId} AND ar.deleted = 0 AND ar.acquire_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ar.acquire_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY ar.acquire_time ASC
